subject: Traders Daily Report
body:
Investors are paying attention to CPMM. Volume Up 120.7%
China Premium Lifestyle
Symbol: CPMM
Close: $0.28  UP +0.02 (+7.69%)
China Premium Lifestyle Reports 2006 Results:
Consolidated sales/year were $71.5 million, 47% increase over the 2005 fiscal year. On the 2nd day (Apr 10) financials are posted Volume has 120% increased.
What will it do on the 3rd day (Apr 11)? More news is expected.
